metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3575 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in openjpeg in color.c:379:42 in sycc420_to_rgb when decompressing a crafted .j2k file. An attacker could use this to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the application compiled against openjpeg.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-05-15, the proposed pull as not been commited eslerm> issue 1363 related but contested as duplicate ccdm94> PR 1362 has not yet been merged as of 2023-05-15. The patch for this issue still seems to be under discussion. rodrigo-zaiden> as of 2023-08-23, still no updates from upstream.
